entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (npe_brawler_bully.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_18: I saw you talking to Tiarsis. She's a hot little number, isn't she?
entries.s_20: Um, sure. She has a message for you.
entries.s_22: Does she now? She just doesn't appreciate my considerable charms.
entries.s_24: She's said that I can kill you if you don't leave her customers alone.
entries.s_26: Whoa there. No need to be hasty. I'll behave myself! In fact, I'll even help her out! I...overheard a group of people calling themselves the Genesis Red talk about sabotaging the lower levels of the station!
entries.s_28: You look like you want to give me money for a drink.
